trans-unit.source: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en visningsmodus som viser dataelementer i kolonner for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GridView class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control in a series of columns.
trans-unit.target: Klassen GridView og støttet klassene gir infrastruktur for å vise dataelementer som er angitt for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontrollen i en serie med kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene har kolonneoverskrifter som knappene som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, og du kan endre rekkefølgen på kolonnene ved hjelp av dra og slipp-operasjoner.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Note that the columns of a GridView display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: Merk at kolonnene i en GridView viser data og gir ikke direkte tilgang til kilden til dataene.

trans-unit.source: To specify a GridView as the view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property to a GridView object.
trans-unit.target: Angi en GridView som visningsmodus for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, angitt den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen til et objekt for GridView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The GridView class is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: GridView klassen hentes fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: You can define custom views by inheriting from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase> class that provides the supporting elements for a view.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere egendefinerte visninger ved arving fra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>klassen som tilbyr støttet elementene i en visning.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: opprette en egendefinert visningsmodus for en listevisningen blir](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> that uses a GridView.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser et eksempel på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>som bruker en GridView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") The columns in a GridView are defined as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects.
trans-unit.target: ![Listevisning med GridView utdata](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "listevisning med GridView utdata") kolonnene i en GridView er definert som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects as child elements of the GridView.
trans-unit.target: I [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], kan du definere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objekter som underordnede elementer for GridView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: In code, you can add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> to the GridView by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property and the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method that is defined for the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class.
trans-unit.target: Koden, og du kan legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>for GridView ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>metoden som er definert for <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>klassen.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can use other <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> methods such as <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> to modify the columns in a GridView.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte kan du bruke andre <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>metoder som <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A>og <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>å endre kolonnene i en GridView.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define the columns of a GridView.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du definerer kolonnene i en GridView.

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-cs[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/listviewcode/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] To style the rows in a GridView, define a style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)][!code-cs[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)][!code-vb[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/listviewcode/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn) ] for å style radene i en GridView, kan du definere en stil for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>Kontroller i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: To add visual elements, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control, to a GridView, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: Å legge til visuelle elementer, for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>tilgangskontroll til som en GridView bruke maler eller stiler.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [slik: opprette ListViewItems med en avmerkingsboks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The column to add
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen for å legge til

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Text cannot be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Teksten kan ikke legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden vil føre til at et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Text string
trans-unit.target: Tekststreng

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether columns in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> can be reordered by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om kolonner i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> kan sorteres på nytt ved å dra og slipp.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns can be reordered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kolonnene kan sorteres på nytt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Removes all settings, bindings, and styling from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle innstillinger, bindinger og stil fra en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A> that is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, in addition to any styling that was applied to it by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A>som er knyttet til en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, i tillegg til eventuelle stil som ble brukt av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to clear.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> til å tømme.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: ID for ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stil til kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnHeaderContainerStyle property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property are both used to define the visual tree for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects that represent the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ColumnHeaderContainerStyle og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen begge brukes til å definere visual treet for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>objekter som representerer kolonneoverskriftene i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ColumnHeaderContainerStyle property can also define column header content when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> is not by specified by defining a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ColumnHeaderContainerStyle kan også definere kolonneoverskriften innhold når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>er ikke angis ved å definere en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en av flere måter å sette opp og style kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [GridView kolonner hodet stiler og maler oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt stiler, er det noen begrensninger.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [stil og Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ## XAML verdier `ResourceExtension` ett av følgende: `StaticResource`, eller `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [XAML ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`Nøkkelen som identifiserer stilen som kreves.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen refererer til en eksisterende ressurs i <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen element syntaksen er teknisk mulig, men anbefales ikke.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [innebygde stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: En binding til ved hjelp av eller er også mulig, men uvanlig.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is used to define the display properties for column headers.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> som brukes til å definere visningsegenskapene for kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle*>

trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en av flere måter å sette opp og style kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [GridView kolonner hodet stiler og maler oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> for the column headers in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> for kolonneoverskriftene i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer kolonneoverskriftene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> hvis de vises som strenger.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>angitt, ignoreres denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke flere egenskaper for å angi formatet for kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer enn én egenskap er satt, formatert kolonneoverskriften med verdien for egenskapen som har høyest prioritet.

trans-unit.source: The format for a column can be set on several types.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for en kolonne kan angis for flere typer.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - ColumnHeaderStringFormat - - ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: Følgende liste viser egenskapene som kan brukes til å formatere kolonneoverskriftene i fra laveste høyest prioritet: - ColumnHeaderStringFormat - - ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| None|

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer kolonneoverskriftene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> hvis de vises som strenger.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template to use to display the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som skal brukes til å vise kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeaderTemplate property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the ColumnHeaderTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ColumnHeaderTemplate og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>er begge satt, prioriteres egenskapen ColumnHeaderTemplate.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en av flere måter å sette opp og style kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [GridView kolonner hodet stiler og maler oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use to display the column headers as part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> skal brukes til å vise kolonneoverskriftene som en del av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selector object that provides logic for selecting a template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir velgeren-objektet som inneholder logikken for å velge en mal som brukes for hver kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property for all columns if it is defined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke har angitt for denne egenskapen, er standard logikken å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen for alle kolonner hvis den er definert.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen og ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector-egenskapen er satt, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en av flere måter å sette opp og style kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [GridView kolonner hodet stiler og maler oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier `ResourceExtension` ett av følgende: `StaticResource`, eller `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [XAML ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey` The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey`Nøkkelen som identifiserer velgeren implementeringen som kreves.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen refererer til en utledede klassen som implementerer en praktiske <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du tilordner den egendefinerte klassen [XAML navneområder og Namespace tilordningen for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to the application resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også programmatisk legge til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>klassen som en ressurs i applikasjonen ressursen ordlisten.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation` A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation`En klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>som implementerer en praktiske <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du tilordner den egendefinerte klassen [XAML navneområder og Namespace tilordningen for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that determines the data template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objektet som bestemmer datamalen som skal brukes for hver kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip that appears when the mouse pointer pauses over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innholdet i et verktøytips som vises når musepekeren holder over én av kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en av flere måter å sette opp og style kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [GridView kolonner hodet stiler og maler oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values `toolTipContent` A string that becomes the display text for the ColumnHeaderToolTip.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` - or - ``` ## XAML verdier `toolTipContent` en streng som blir teksten for ColumnHeaderToolTip.

trans-unit.source: `toolTipObjectContent` An object to use as the content for the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: `toolTipObjectContent`Et objekt som brukes som innholdet for verktøytipset.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that defines a layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, such as a text element.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er vanligvis en <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>eller et annet element som definerer et oppsett for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, for eksempel et tekst-element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: In this usage, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: I denne Bruk en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>elementet er implisitt opprettet fra den analysere [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], og `toolTipObjectContent` innhold som er angitt som den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: <`ToolTip` .../> See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: `ToolTip`.../> See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the content that appears as a tooltip when the mouse pointer is paused over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer innhold som vises som et verktøytips når musepekeren holdes over én av kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: The default value is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects that is defined for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objekter som er definert for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you modify the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, by using methods that are inherited from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class, such as the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du endre kolonnene som er definert for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, ved hjelp av metodene som er arvet fra den <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>class, for eksempel den <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, og <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage 0 ## XAML Values `OneOrMoreGridViewColumns` One or more elements.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk 0 ## XAML verdier `OneOrMoreGridViewColumns` én eller flere elementer.

trans-unit.target: Samlingen av kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Bruk denne metoden for å endre kolonnesamlingen for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hent, angi eller endre kolonnene som er definert for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objekt, bruker du den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> that is associated with the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> som er knyttet til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>for det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for each <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter nøkkelen som refererer til stilen som er definert for hver <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> that references the style for each <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"> </xref> som refererer til stilen for hver <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value references the default style for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> control in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien refererer til standardstilen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> kontrollen i gjeldende tema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> control that encloses the content that is displayed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter nøkkelen som refererer til stilen som er definert for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> kontrollen som omfatter innhold som vises av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne skrivebeskyttet statisk egenskapen i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ved å tilordne statiske verdien til en annen egenskapsverdi.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt definerer statisk verdi for denne egenskapen Ressursnøkkelen som brukes til å slå opp standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>stilen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil omdefinere denne stilen, refererer til GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey ved hjelp av den [x: statiske Markup utvidelsen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og tilordne den verdien som den [x: nøkkel direktivet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for ny <xref:System.Windows.Style>.</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> that references the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> control for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"> </xref> som refererer til den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> som skal brukes på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> kontrollere for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> object of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> objekter av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> i gjeldende tema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter nøkkelen som refererer til stilen som er definert for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne skrivebeskyttet statisk egenskapen i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ved å tilordne statiske verdien til en annen egenskapsverdi.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> style.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt statisk verdi for denne egenskapen definerer Ressursnøkkelen som brukes til å slå opp standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>stil.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the GridViewStyleKey by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil omdefinere denne stilen, refererer til GridViewStyleKey ved hjelp av den [x: statiske Markup utvidelsen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og tilordne den verdien som den [x: nøkkel direktivet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for ny <xref:System.Windows.Style>.</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](../Topic/x:Key%20Directive.md) of a <xref:System.Windows.Style> that redefines the <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne skrivebeskyttet egenskap i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] som en [x: nøkkel direktivet](../Topic/x:Key%20Directive.md) av en <xref:System.Windows.Style>som definerer den <xref:System.Windows.Style>for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> that references the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"> </xref> som refererer til den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> som skal brukes på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> i gjeldende tema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reference to the default style for the container of the data items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter referansen til standardstilen for beholderen av data i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewItemContainerStyleKey*>. The default value is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewItemContainerStyleKey*> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: The <>*>. Standardverdien er den <> </> *> i gjeldende tema.

trans-unit.source: Prepares a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> for display according to the definition of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Klargjør en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> for visning i henhold til definisjonen av dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to apply styles, to set data bindings, and to attach a column collection to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan brukes til å bruke stiler, til å angi dataene bindinger og koble til en kolonne-samling til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Sets the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Angir innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Bruk denne metoden for å endre kolonnesamlingen for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hent, angi eller endre kolonnene som er definert for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objekt, bruker du den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> object to assign.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> objektet du vil tilordne.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om å serialisere den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: The object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> is set.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et underordnet objekt.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: Det underordnede objektet til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til tekstinnhold i en node i objektet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du vil legge til objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer strengrepresentasjon av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir antall kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.
